entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
